name: Winter City Landing
description: A landing page with a hero section featuring a stylized cityscape and minimal UI elements.

atoms.name: Translucent Overlay
atoms.description: A semi-transparent white surface for layering content on top of the background image.

atoms.name: Pill Button
atoms.description: A small, rounded button used for secondary actions.
atoms.css: background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 9999px; padding: 8px 16px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500;

atoms.name: Hero Heading
atoms.description: Large, prominent heading for the hero section.

atoms.name: Minimal Navigation
atoms.description: Simple navigation bar with subtle styling.
atoms.css: display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-end; gap: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;

best_for: Landing pages for AI or technology companies
Websites with a strong visual identity
Hero sections emphasizing a clean and modern aesthetic
Presenting complex information in a simplified manner
Creating a sense of sophistication and innovation
avoid_for: Data-heavy dashboards requiring high information density
Applications requiring high accessibility standards (contrast issues)
Websites targeting a very young audience (too serious)
Projects needing a playful or energetic design
Situations where a realistic or photographic style is preferred
